title: Slow Cooker Hot Roast Beef Sandwich
directions: Put all ingredients (except for rolls and cheese) into slow cooker and cook on low for 2 - 2 1/2 hours
Serve on fresh buns (get some of the gravy onto the bun!) and with provolone cheese
Optional to melt cheese in the oven on the bread
**IF FREEZING - place meat in the bag, mix together all ingredients except rolls and cheese, then pour over meat and freeze**
